metadata.title: CVE-2020-12413 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
The Raccoon attack is a timing attack on DHE ciphersuites inherit in theTLS specification. To mitigate this vulnerability, Firefox disabled supportfor DHE ciphersuites.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-12413` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libnss3 - 2:3.35-2ubuntu2.14
libnss3-tools - 2:3.35-2ubuntu2.14
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nss package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:3.35-2ubuntu2.14').
